meanings.meaning: thousands of nameless and faceless workers

vlive.korean: 수천 명의 간절한 마음들이 한자리에 모여 따뜻한 눈빛으로 서로를 응원하던 그날 밤. Thousands of hearts gathered in one place, supporting each other with warm eyes. 듣기 View video MOMO X : [모모문고] 여자친구 유주 편
vlive.english: Thousands of hearts gathered in one place, supporting each other with warm eyes.

vlive.korean: 청하탕, 수천탕... - 어머, 어머. Cheongha-tang, Suchun-tang. - Oh my. 듣기 View video 10PM : [10pm2 월] 하지영의 한밤의 연예뉴스 A night's entertainment news
중국은 수천 만이 죽었다고 하네요. More than 10 million has died in China. 듣기 View video 10PM : 김태훈, 정시우의 무비톡톡! Movie talk!talk!
vlive.english: More than 10 million has died in China.

vlive.korean: 정말 많은 수천여 관객분들과 함께했는데요. Thousands of people came to my concert. 듣기 View video SMTOWN : 가을에는 발라드규 🍁 규현 깜짝 LIVE
vlive.english: Thousands of people came to my concert.

vlive.korean: 수천 명이 있었고 열기도 대단했고요. There were thousands of people. Everyone was very excited. 듣기 View video V MOVIE : [REPLAY] <공각기동대 : 고스트 인 더 쉘> 내한 V 라이브 인터뷰 ' V live Interview'
vlive.english: There were thousands of people. Everyone was very excited.

examples.english: Thousands of hectares of forest are destroyed each year. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: People flocked in their thousands to see her. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 사람들이 수천 명씩 무리를 지어 그녀를 보러 왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
